name: BMO
ability: Discard a card from your hand >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature.

name: Lady Rainicorn
ability: If you return two or more Creatures to your hand from play or your discard pile during your turn, heal 2 HP.

name: Beach Mummy
ability: FLOOP >>> Return a Creature in an adjacent Lane to its owner's hand.

name: Chest Burster
ability: At the start of your turn, deal 3 Damage to each opponent who has no cards in hand.

name: Dark Angel
ability: +1 ATK for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Dr. Death
ability: Destroy a Creature you control and FLOOP >>> Destroy target opposing Creature in this Lane.

name: Extraordinary Spider
ability: At the start of your turn, deal 1 Damage to target opponent for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Fummy
ability: FLOOP >>> Gain 1 Action this turn.

name: Gray Eyebat
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Return a random Useless Swamp Creature from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Green Cactiball
ability: +2 ATK for each Green Cactiball you control.

name: Green Mermaid
ability: Destroy Green Mermaid >>> Deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature.

name: Green Merman
ability: FLOOP >>> Put the top card of your deck into your discard pile. Deal damage to each opposing Creature equal to the discarded cards Action Cost.

name: Hot Eyebat
ability: Play Hot Eyebat only if you have 10 or more cards in your discard pile.

name: Immortal Maize Walker
ability: While Immortal Maize Walker is on a Cornfield Landscape, it deals triple Damage.

name: Lost Golem
ability: Lost Golem costs 1 less to play for each other Creature you have played this turn.

name: Mace Stump
ability: Destroy Mace Stump >>> Target opponent discards a card for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Mouthball
ability: +2 DEF for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Ms. Mummy
ability: At the start of your turn, you may return Ms. Mummy to its owner's hand. If you do, target SandyLand Creature you control gains 1 DEF.

name: Peach Djinni
ability: When a SandyLand Creature enters play under your control, Peach Djinni has +1 ATK this turn.

name: Red Eyeling
ability: FLOOP >>> Return a card with cost 0 from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Sand Eyebat
ability: When another Creature enters play under your control, Sand Eyebat gains 1 DEF.

name: Sand Knights
ability: +2 ATK if you control a Blue Plains Landscape.

name: Sandhorn Devil
ability: When Sandhorn Devil enters play, deal 1 Damage to each Creature in play (including each of your Creatures).

name: Sandsnake
ability: When Sandsnake enters play, deal 4 Damage to target opposing Creature in this Lane.

name: SandWitch
ability: When SandWitch or another Creature enters play under your control, deal 1 Damage to your opponent.

name: Shark
ability: When a SandyLand Creature enters play during your turn (including Shark), it has +1 ATK this turn.

name: Teeth Leaf
ability: If you have 10 or more cards in your discard pile, pay 2 fewer Actions to play Teeth Leaf.

name: The Mariachi
ability: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature for each Creature that entered play this turn.

name: Tree of Undeath
ability: FLOOP >>> Return a random Creature from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Wall of Sand
ability: If one or more other SandyLand Creatures enter play during your turn, Wall of Sand has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Wandering Bald Man
ability: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your discard pile.

name: Abraca Amadeus
ability: Target opponent discards a card from his hand for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Bone Wand
ability: Play only if you control a Useless Swamp Creature. Target opponent discards a card from his hand.

name: Magic Ring Ding
ability: Each of your Creatures has +1 ATK this turn for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Ogre Gas
ability: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them on the bottom of your deck and discard the rest.

name: Snake Eye Ring
ability: Return a random Useless Swamp Creature from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Tome of Ankhs
ability: Draw a card for each of your empty Lanes.

name: Unempty Coffin
ability: Reduce the cost of the next Creature you play this turn by 2 Actions.

name: ZaZo's Magic Seeds
ability: Target SandyLands Creature has +2 ATK this turn for each Creature that entered play into an adjacent Lane this turn.

name: Palace of Bone
ability: Opposing Creatures in this Lane don't trigger entering or leaving play effects.

name: Sand Sphinx
ability: FLOOP >>> Return a Creature you control in this Lane to its owner's hand.

name: Spirit Tower
ability: Pay 1 Action and FLOOP >>> If you control no Creatures in this Lane, move target Creature in this Lane to your side and ready it. At the end of turn, return it to its owner's side.
